meanings.definition: The quality of being engaging or captivating.
meanings.sent1: The interestingness of the movie kept me glued to the screen.
meanings.sent2: The book's interestingness made it hard to put down.
meanings.sent3: The party's interestingness was so high that everyone stayed until the end.
meanings.sent4: The interestingness of the mystery unraveled slowly, keeping me guessing until the end.
meanings.sent5: The interestingness of the painting drew me in, making me want to explore every detail.

meanings.definition: The state of being thought-provoking or stimulating.
meanings.sent1: The interestingness of the discussion sparked new ideas in my mind.
meanings.sent2: The lecture's interestingness made the topic easier to understand.
meanings.sent3: The interestingness of the experiment led to unexpected results.
meanings.sent4: The interestingness of the theory challenged my previous beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The interestingness of the debate kept me engaged and eager to learn more.
